message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.  What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
